statements: DELETE FROM LivestockMortality WHERE animal_type = 'Cow' AND cause_of_death = 'Disease';
DELETE FROM LivestockMortality WHERE id = 100 AND animal_type = 'Cow';
DELETE FROM LivestockMortality WHERE date_of_death < '2022-01-01' AND mortality_rate > 0.2;
DELETE FROM LivestockMortality WHERE id = 1 AND animal_type = 'Cow';
DELETE FROM HerdHealthManagement WHERE health_status = 'Critical' AND management_strategy = 'Isolation for observation';
DELETE FROM HerdHealth WHERE LivestockID IN (SELECT ID FROM Livestock WHERE Age > 10);
DELETE FROM livestock_mortality_records WHERE livestock_id = 123 AND mortality_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM livestock_mortality_records WHERE cause_of_death = 'Disease' AND livestock_id = 456;
